trans-unit.source: Provides properties and methods for defining a route and for obtaining information about the route.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于定义路由和获取有关路由的信息的属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> class enables you to specify how routing is processed in an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route>类，可指定如何路由在 ASP.NET 应用程序中处理。

trans-unit.source: You create a <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> object for each URL pattern that you want to map to a class that can handle requests that correspond to that pattern.
trans-unit.target: 你创建<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route>对象每个你想要将映射到可以处理的类的 URL 模式请求对应于该模式。

trans-unit.source: You then add the route to the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 然后，你添加到的路由<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: When the application receives a request, ASP.NET routing iterates through the routes in the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes%2A> collection to find the first route that matches the pattern of the URL.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序收到请求时，ASP.NET 路由循环访问中的路由<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes%2A>集合以找到与 URL 模式匹配的第一个路由。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Url%2A> property to a URL pattern.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Url%2A>URL 模式的属性。

trans-unit.source: The URL pattern consists of segments that come after the application name in an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: URL 模式由 HTTP 请求中的应用程序名称之后的段组成。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the URL `http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`, the pattern applies to `products/show/beverages`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 URL 中`http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`，模式将应用于`products/show/beverages`。

trans-unit.source: A pattern with three segments, such as `{controller}/{action}/{id}`, matches the URL `http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`.
trans-unit.target: 有三个模式网段，如`{controller}/{action}/{id}`，与 URL 匹配`http://www.contoso.com/products/show/beverages`。

trans-unit.source: Each segment is delimited by the `/` character.
trans-unit.target: 由分隔每个段`/`字符。

trans-unit.source: When a segment is enclosed in braces (`{` and `}`), the segment is referred to a URL parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当将一个段括在大括号 (`{`和`}`)，该分段是 URL 参数。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET routing retrieves the value from the request and assigns it to the URL parameter.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 路由请求中检索值，并将其分配给 URL 参数。

trans-unit.source: In the previous example, the URL parameter `action` is assigned the value `show`.
trans-unit.target: 在前面的示例中，URL 参数`action`分配的值`show`。

trans-unit.source: If the segment is not enclosed in braces, the value is treated as a literal value.
trans-unit.target: 如果段不括在大括号，则值视为文字值。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults%2A> property to a <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary> object that includes values that are used if a parameter is missing from the URL or to set additional values that are not parameterized in the URL.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary>包括在从 URL 或设置不参数化的其他值在 URL 中缺少参数，则使用值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A> property to a <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary> object that contains values that are either regular expressions or <xref:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint> objects.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary>对象，其中包含为正则表达式的值或<xref:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint>对象。

trans-unit.source: These values are used to determine whether a parameter value is valid.
trans-unit.target: 这些值用于确定参数值是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> object and add it to the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route>对象，并将其添加到<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.Route" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.Route" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The URL pattern for the route.
trans-unit.target: 路由的 URL 模式。

trans-unit.source: The object that processes requests for the route.
trans-unit.target: 处理路由请求的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.Route" /> class, by using the specified URL pattern and handler class.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 URL 模式和处理程序类初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.Route" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> object and add it to the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route>对象，并将其添加到<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The URL pattern for the route.
trans-unit.target: 路由的 URL 模式。

trans-unit.source: The values to use for any parameters that are missing in the URL.
trans-unit.target: 可用于 URL 中缺少的任何参数的值。

trans-unit.source: The object that processes requests for the route.
trans-unit.target: 处理路由请求的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.Route" /> class, by using the specified URL pattern, default parameter values, and handler class.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 URL 模式、默认参数值和处理程序类初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.Route" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The URL pattern for the route.
trans-unit.target: 路由的 URL 模式。

trans-unit.source: The values to use if the URL does not contain all the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 要在 URL 不包含所有参数时使用的值。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression that specifies valid values for a URL parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于指定 URL 参数的有效值的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The object that processes requests for the route.
trans-unit.target: 处理路由请求的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.Route" /> class, by using the specified URL pattern, default parameter values, constraints, and handler class.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 URL 模式、默认参数值、约束和处理程序类初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.Route" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The URL pattern for the route.
trans-unit.target: 路由的 URL 模式。

trans-unit.source: The values to use if the URL does not contain all the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 要在 URL 不包含所有参数时使用的值。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression that specifies valid values for a URL parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于指定 URL 参数的有效值的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Custom values that are passed to the route handler, but which are not used to determine whether the route matches a specific URL pattern.
trans-unit.target: 传递到路由处理程序但未用于确定该路由是否与特定 URL 模式匹配的自定义值。

trans-unit.source: These values are passed to the route handler, where they can be used for processing the request.
trans-unit.target: 这些值会传递到路由处理程序，以便用于处理请求。

trans-unit.source: The object that processes requests for the route.
trans-unit.target: 处理路由请求的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.Route" /> class, by using the specified URL pattern, default parameter values, constraints, custom values, and handler class.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 URL 模式、默认参数值、约束、自定义值和处理程序类初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Routing.Route" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a dictionary of expressions that specify valid values for a URL parameter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表达式字典，用于指定 URL 参数的有效值。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the parameter names and expressions.
trans-unit.target: 包含参数名称和表达式的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A> property enables you to limit acceptable values for a URL parameter that is processed by a route.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A>属性使您能够限制可接受的处理的路由的 URL 参数值。

trans-unit.source: You assign a <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary> object to the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你分配<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Each element in the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary> object contains the name of a parameter and one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 在每个元素<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary>对象包含的名称的参数和以下项之一：

trans-unit.source: A string that defines a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 一个定义正则表达式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint> interface and that includes a <xref:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint.Match%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint>接口，并且包括<xref:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint.Match%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint> class implements the <xref:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint> 类实现 <xref:System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint> 接口。

trans-unit.source: You can include an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint> class as a constraint to specify which HTTP verbs are acceptable for the route.
trans-unit.target: 你可以包含的实例<xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint>类作为约束以指定的 HTTP 谓词的可接受的路由。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> object and set the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.DataTokens%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route>对象，并将<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.DataTokens%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> object whose <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A> property contains a parameter named `httpMethod` with an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint> class for the value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route>对象，其<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A>属性包含一个名为参数`httpMethod`与实例<xref:System.Web.Routing.HttpMethodConstraint>的值的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets custom values that are passed to the route handler, but which are not used to determine whether the route matches a URL pattern.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置传递到路由处理程序但未用于确定该路由是否与 URL 模式匹配的自定义值。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains custom values.
trans-unit.target: 包含自定义值的对象。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteData.DataTokens%2A> property to retrieve or assign values associated with the route that are not used to determine whether a route matches a URL pattern.
trans-unit.target: 你使用<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteData.DataTokens%2A>检索或分配未用于确定路由是否与 URL 模式匹配的值与路由关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: These values are passed to the route handler, where they can be used for processing the request.
trans-unit.target: 这些值会传递到路由处理程序，以便用于处理请求。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> object and set the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.DataTokens%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route>对象，并将<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.DataTokens%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the values to use if the URL does not contain all the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在 URL 不包含所有参数时使用的值。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the parameter names and default values.
trans-unit.target: 包含参数名称和默认值的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults%2A> property enables you to set the value for a URL parameter if the URL does not contain a segment for that parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults%2A>属性使您能够设置 URL 参数的值，如果 URL 不包含为该参数的段。

trans-unit.source: You assign a <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary> object to the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你分配<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Each element in the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary> object contains the name of a parameter and the value to use if the parameter is missing.
trans-unit.target: 在每个元素<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary>对象包含的参数和要使用如果参数是缺少的值的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can include a default value for a parameter that is not defined in the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Url%2A> property as a segment.
trans-unit.target: 你可以包括中未定义的参数的默认值<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Url%2A>作为段的属性。

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET routing handles a request, this default value is always passed to the route handler.
trans-unit.target: 当 ASP.NET 路由处理请求时，此默认值是始终传递给路由处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When you construct a URL and you include a value for a default parameter that is not defined as a segment, the route will only be considered a match if the value that you provided matches the default value for the route.
trans-unit.target: 构造的 URL 并将包含未作为段定义的默认参数的值，路由将仅被视为匹配如果你提供的值与匹配的路由的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> object and set the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.DataTokens%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route>对象，并将<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.DataTokens%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route> object whose <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults%2A> property contains a parameter that is not part of the pattern in the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Url%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route>对象，其<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Defaults%2A>属性包含一个参数，不是中的模式的一部分<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Url%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: An object that encapsulates information about the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，该对象封装有关 HTTP 请求的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the requested route.
trans-unit.target: 返回有关请求的路由的信息。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the values from the route definition.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，其中包含路由定义中的值。

trans-unit.source: An object that encapsulates information about the requested route.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，封装有关所请求的路由的信息。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the parameters for a route.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含路由的参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the URL that is associated with the route.
trans-unit.target: 返回与路由关联的 URL 的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains information about the URL that is associated with the route.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它包含与路由关联的 URL 的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: An object that encapsulates information about the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，该对象封装有关 HTTP 请求的信息。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression or object to use to test <c>parameterName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 将用于测试 <c>parameterName</c> 的正则表达式或对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The values to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的值。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether URL routing is processing an incoming request or constructing a URL.
trans-unit.target: 指定 URL 路由是在处理传入请求还是在构建 URL 的值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a parameter value matches the constraint for that parameter.
trans-unit.target: 确定参数值是否与该参数的约束相匹配。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the parameter value matches the constraint; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数值与约束匹配，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="constraint" /> is not a string that contains a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="constraint" /> 不是包含正则表达式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that processes requests for the route.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置处理路由的请求的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that processes the request.
trans-unit.target: 用于处理请求的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL pattern for the route.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置路由的 URL 模式。

trans-unit.source: The pattern for matching the route to a URL.
trans-unit.target: 用于匹配到 URL 的路由的模式。

trans-unit.source: When you assign a value to the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Url%2A> property, the `/` character is interpreted as a delimiter when the URL is parsed.
trans-unit.target: 当你将值赋给<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Url%2A>属性，`/`字符被解释为分隔符时分析该 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use braces (`{}`) to define a variable that is referred to as a *URL parameter*.
trans-unit.target: 使用大括号 (`{}`) 来定义变量被称为*URL 参数*。

trans-unit.source: The value from the matching segment in the URL is assigned to the URL parameter.
trans-unit.target: 从 URL 中的匹配段的值分配给 URL 参数。

trans-unit.source: Any values in the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Url%2A> property that are not enclosed in braces are treated as literal constants.
trans-unit.target: 中的任何值<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Url%2A>不括在大括号中的属性将被视为文字的常量。

trans-unit.source: The `?` character is not allowed in the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Url%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `?`中不允许使用字符<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Url%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Each URL segment must be separated by either a delimiter or literal constant.
trans-unit.target: 必须按分隔符或文本常量分隔每个 URL 段。

trans-unit.source: You can use `{{` or `}}` as escape characters for a brace character.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`{{`或`}}`为转义大括号字符的字符。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Url%2A> property in the class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.Routing.Route.Url%2A>类构造函数中的属性。

trans-unit.source: The pattern contains the literal value "Category" for the first segment and URL parameters for the next two segments.
trans-unit.target: 模式的第一条线段和接下来的两段的 URL 参数包含的文本值"类别"。

trans-unit.source: Any of the following:
trans-unit.target: 以下任何项：

trans-unit.source: The value starts with <c>~</c> or <c>/</c>.
trans-unit.target: 以 <c>~</c> 或 <c>/</c> 开头的值。

trans-unit.source: The value contains a <c>?</c>
trans-unit.target: 该值包含 <c>?</c>

trans-unit.source: character.
trans-unit.target: 字符。

trans-unit.source: The catch-all parameter is not last.
trans-unit.target: “全部捕捉”参数不在末尾。

trans-unit.source: URL segments are not separated by a delimiter or a literal constant.
trans-unit.target: URL 段不使用分隔符或文本常量进行分隔。
